_sText:
Fightyard 2k7 is basically a straight foward  frag match with quite a few different places to hide and pwn other players with a very futuristic approach to the style. the spawn points are tubes every player individually spawns from to give it a more future feel. there is some colorfull lighting to brighten the map up a bit.
some of the weapons may be a bit close but you can work it out =). all weapons are equipped with 100 ammo so have fun fraggin !

dk_maps
